title: 新人入坑求推荐
author: 阜東shinnyou
txt_content:
新人小白
刚开始玩MC
老是会迷路和挖矿时出不来等等事情
不知道有没有大佬愿意推荐下可以辅助新手的mod
另外想求一波好玩的mod的推荐

replies.author: 龙域RPG
replies.txt_content:
去隔壁整合版块找!
一大堆好玩的

replies.author: Norteker
replies.txt_content: 工业，对新人非常友好（坏笑）
群峦传说吧，一个挺休闲的mod

replies.author: 丑喜人丶
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，

replies.author: 落雨mc
replies.txt_content: 欢迎呀，记得看版规

replies.author: 阜東shinnyou
replies.txt_content:
落雨mc 发表于 2020-4-15 23:16
欢迎呀，记得看版规
好的

replies.author: 滑稽骚年666
replies.txt_content: 同样都是新人 摸一手鱼=-=

replies.author: Phwan
replies.txt_content: 去找整合包玩！
记得看版规哦大佬

replies.author: gecccc
replies.txt_content: 萌新还是玩纯净服，先熟悉一下特**。

replies.author: zhjc
replies.txt_content: 先装个地图mod叭

replies.author: jun_zhu
replies.txt_content: 个人觉得小地图好一点= =

replies.author: Ghostmeow
replies.txt_content: 先玩玩原版吧

replies.author: dfsy
replies.txt_content: 欢迎欢迎

replies.author: PG-Rina
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人多看版规少吃亏

replies.author: Super失落lost
replies.txt_content: 地图mod，jei内置合成表，

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 试试工业？

replies.author: 卡壳
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人

replies.author: 是守望吖~
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人，善用搜索功能

replies.author: Liu_Ze
replies.txt_content: 隔壁整合区找整合包很多的
工业跟拔刀剑

replies.author: 魅-内存君
replies.txt_content: 去随便逛逛，有很多好玩的。

replies.author: 我是木木
replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人 可以试试小地图mod啊
